snippet: A dispute over whether a terminally ill woman should have been given tea and toast or an orange apparently upset her husband so much that he shot and killed two of her sisters and his own son before killing himself.
abstract: Dispute over meal for terminally ill woman Darlene Gilkey of Logan, Ohio, apparently upsets husband Paul Gilkey so much that he shoots and kills two of her sisters and his own son, before killing himself.
lead_paragraph: A dispute over whether a terminally ill woman should have been given tea and toast or an orange apparently upset her husband so much that he shot and killed two of her sisters and his own son before killing himself.

headline.main: Ohio: 4 Dead in Dispute Over Ill Woman
headline.print_headline: Ohio: 4 Dead In Dispute Over Ill Woman
